pages.text: Spices can be apply to stews and dishes when they are taken from stew pots or pans. Spices can add a short potion effect to the food. If food with spice is cooked again, it would lost its spice. Spice are contained in flower pots and some of the spices are made by resting.
Chives can provide slow falling effect
Garum are made from fish in doliums, provides jump boost effect.
Vinegar are made from berries or apple in doliums, provides night vision effect.
